snippet: Jonathan Toubin, a Brooklyn D.J., is back spinning records, less than five months after a bizarre accident left him close to death in Portland, Ore.
abstract: Brooklyn DJ Jonathan Toubin was badly injured in December 2011 when a taxi crashed through the wall of his hotel room in Portland, Ore; after months of recovery and physical therapy he is once again hosting dance parties around New York City. Photos (M)m
lead_paragraph: Four months ago Jonathan Toubin woke up in a hospital bed barely alive. Mr. Toubin, a 40-year-old D.J. and rising figure in the Brooklyn music scene, had been lying in bed in a hotel room in Portland, Ore., resting up for a show, when a taxi crashed through the wall and pinned him under its wheels. ''It's a random, absurd thing that shouldn't happen but happened,'' he said.

headline.main: Back Spinning, After the World Stopped
